packageInfo:
Optimize your billboards* 



*genuine results not guaranteed

Add the staminometer to your decompile!
Instructions:
1) Go to _BASIC/Packages/Staminometer
2) Drag the Staminometer prefab into your hud.
3)Go to the player script.
4) replace the "Slider" field with the one inside the prefab.
5) Optinoally, deactive the original slider!
